name: SubUser_Get
description: Get a sub user. The user must be assigend to the user that makes this call.

$block: Container data for the sub user

$ul: **AccessEndDate**: The end date. until this date the user has access
**AccessTimeStartDate**: The start date. From this date the user has access
**NewPassword**: If set this is used a new password
**PermissionLevel**: The permission level of the user
